metadata.title: CVE-2022-39264 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: nheko is a desktop client for the Matrix communication application. Allversions below 0.10.2 are vulnerable homeservers inserting malicioussecrets, which could lead to man-in-the-middle attacks. Users can upgradeto version 0.10.2 to protect against this issue. As a workaround, one mayapply the patch manually, avoid doing verifications of one's own devices,and/or avoid pressing the request button in the settings menu.

criterions.comment: nheko: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
